# Yonathan Arbel Scholarly Corpus

> Machine-readable corpus of legal scholarship.

## Start Here
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/papers/

## Key Papers
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/papers/ssrn-3519630/

## Machine Endpoints
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/sitemap.xml
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/atom.xml
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/llms.txt
- https://yonathanarbel.github.io/my-works-for-llm/llms-full.txt
